content: 4 double_crochet in space ch2 double_crochet round 9 ch2 3 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch10 16 slip_stitch on the eyes of the skull tip count 8 from the middle so your stitches will be balanced ch8 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space round 10 - ch4 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space chain 6 12 single_crochet on skull ch6 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 double_crochet round 11 ch2 3 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch6 8 single_crochet on skull ch6 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space round 12 - ch4 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch6 6 single_crochet on skull ch6 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 double_crochet round 13 ch2 3 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch6 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space ch2 4 double_crochet in space round 14 - ch4 4 double_crochet in space *ch2 4 double_crochet in space* ch2 double_crochet round 15 ch2 3 double_crochet in space *ch2 4 double_crochet in space* to end of row round 16 same as round 4 2 repeat row 4-15 until desired length make second part and whip stitch together block if needed please feel free to share or link to this free pattern if you like to sell finished items you may do so but please honor me as the designer and treat this pattern as you would wish yours to be treated so please do not sell this pattern it was designed to be shared for free with people who also love to knit and crochet thanks for any questions about this pattern either contact me on ravelry nadelwerk or send me an e- mail karin@nadelwerk com i would love to see pictures of your finished scarf on ravelry if you find any mistakes please let me know and i ll try to correct them as soon as my busy schedule allows me thank you 3 updated august 17 2015 4
